\usetheme{Darmstadt}

\usepackage[T1]{fontenc}
\definecolor{canvascolor}{HTML}{FFCC00}
\usecolortheme[named=canvascolor]{structure}

\usepackage{hyperref}
\hypersetup{
  pdfauthor={...},
  pdftitle={...},
  pdfsubject={...},
  urlcolor=blue,
}

\setbeamertemplate{caption}[numbered]

\usepackage[utf8]{inputenc} % set input encoding (not needed with XeLaTeX)

\usepackage{caption}
\usepackage{subcaption}

\usepackage{float}
\usepackage{tikz}
\usetikzlibrary{fit,trees,shapes,snakes,spy,calc}
\usetikzlibrary{arrows}
\usepackage{multirow}
\usepackage{rotating}
\usepackage{enumerate}
%\usepackage{tabularx}
\usepackage{pgfplots}
\pgfplotsset{compat=1.4} 
% \usepackage{framed}
\usepackage{setspace}
\usepackage{amssymb,amsmath,amsthm}
\usepackage{pifont}
\usepackage{etoolbox}
\usepackage{sgame}
\def\hangUnder#1{\hbox to 0pt{\hspace{-11pt}\raisebox{-4mm}[0pt][0pt]{#1}}}
\usepackage{wasysym}
\usepackage{soul}
\usepackage{scrextend}
\usepackage{adjustbox}

\newenvironment{packed_enum}{
\begin{enumerate}[I]
  \setlength{\itemsep}{1pt}
  \setlength{\parskip}{0pt}
  \setlength{\parsep}{0pt}
}{\end{enumerate}}

\newenvironment{nscenter}
 {\parskip=0pt\par\nopagebreak\centering}
 {\par\noindent\ignorespacesafterend}

\setbeamertemplate{itemize items}[circle]
\setbeamercolor*{block title example}{fg=white,bg=canvascolor}
\setbeamercolor*{block body example}{fg= black,bg= canvascolor!5}
\AtBeginEnvironment{exampleblock}{\setbeamercolor{itemize item}{fg=canvascolor}}
\AtBeginEnvironment{exampleblock}{\setbeamercolor{itemize subitem}{fg=canvascolor}}
